m_szDocTitle: North American International Auto Show 2016: Toyota Displays Future of Mobility - I4U News
m_szDocSumamry: North American International Auto Show 2016: Toyota Displays Future of Mobility Jan 8 2016, 9:29am CST | by M. Affan , in News | Cars & Vehicles Toyota KIKAI Concept 4 images Toyota will showcase its vision of the connected car and future mobility through its IA at its booth in Detroit. Toyota claims to display the future of mobility at the NAIAS 2016. The display will include advanced technology concepts by Toyota. The Toyota exhibit at North American International Auto Show 2016 provides a glimpse at this transformational change to mobility. Toyota will show off the full line of new cars, tr
